website_summaries.verdict: The Simply Calphalon line is designed to be an affordable, entry-level alternative. We recommend it as a great housewarming, birthday or wedding gift. More experienced home cooks may want to consider higher end sets.
pros: Silicone-covered handles stay comfortable and oven safe
Aluminum disk creates even heating on bottom
cons: Challenging to clean and can discolor quickly
Food sticking and burning is an issue with stainless steel pans

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: The stainless steel on a number of the pans were ruined after cooking on it one time. Even with oil and butter, food sticks to the pan and is not easy to cook with. Highly recommend looking into other products.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: These handles are dangerous
customer_reviews.text: The pans are okay; however, the handles are terrible. It has silicon on the edges, but the central metal portion gets extremely hot. They are NOT cool handles. Several burns later and I'm throwing them out.
customer_reviews.author: Florida mom

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and simple set of pans. They look nice hung in the kitchen. I wish the sautee pan is larger to accommodate for vegetables or noodles.
customer_reviews.author: Netquest6

customer_reviews.title: Its calphalon- at a good price! Replaced a set of weel known name ...
customer_reviews.text: Its calphalon- at a good price! Replaced a set of weel known name brand pots n pans that chipped and flaked after a few years, so back to stainless I went. Handwashing should keep these looking great for years
customer_reviews.author: Kundalini Express

customer_reviews.title: Cooks evenly.
customer_reviews.text: Love the 10 piece Stainless Steel from Calphalon. Pan sizes are perfect and I use the large stock pot almost daily. Cooks evenly and clean up is not as challenging as I feared. I would recommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Beasley

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife for Christmas. We were both a little hesitant about doing away with non-stick, but so far it has been great! Main difference is you don't need to cook everything on high heat. We now cook starting at medium heat and works just fine. If something does stick, simply put a little water in it and let it sit, then place in the dishwasher. Everything comes out looking new. Be sure to get some barkeepers friend just as an additional polishing help.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Omran

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price, just getting acclimated to using stainless steel to cook.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Still getting used to some correct amount of heat for ...
customer_reviews.text: Still getting used to some correct amount of heat for some foods, but I am enjoying the ease of cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Hussung

customer_reviews.title: The Best Set I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: Bought the skillets years ago and have not been able to find them. Was VERY excited to see them on Amazon. I have pans that are twice the price that are not nearly as good. Would make a wonderful wedding or graduation gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: New age pots and pans
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality of pots and pans for the new ranges. I researched many brands and spoke to people who cook with Calphalon and I am pleased that I ordered these.
customer_reviews.author: Donna M. Leahy

customer_reviews.title: Being a former chef I love stainless and these have been great
customer_reviews.text: Being a former chef I love stainless and these have been great. Nice and heavy, even heating, and the silicone on the handles is nice to feel.
customer_reviews.author: Ten Brian

customer_reviews.title: Simply calphalon stainless
customer_reviews.text: The stock pot was cracked. Did not bother to take any other pot or pan out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Anniextraloud

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome mid level pan. A worthwhile investment for an everyday cook. Not for beginners or someone accustomed to non stick because everything will stick.
customer_reviews.author: Munz1

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The wife was pleasantly surprised. She loves them, so do I.
customer_reviews.author: Lyle

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME Value
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this set. It looks great. She had no complaints. A great quality buy for the money. Great set.
customer_reviews.author: C. H.

customer_reviews.title: Very good for a home cook.
customer_reviews.text: Very good set for the home cook/chef. No, it's not top of the line, but it works well, just remember to keep temps down lower. If you want to sear a steak, get a cast iron skillet! Same with eggs. Lubricate the pan using butter, olive oil, keep the temps down, and they cook up nice, almost no sticking. One very important thing...when you clean the pans, make absolutely sure you get all of the food off. If any gets recooked, you will have a hard time removing it. Take that time, these pans will give you excellent service.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Quality stainless steel
customer_reviews.text: I'm really glad I decided to buy some good-quality stainless steel. I had a set of Revereware for over 30 years--the Calphalon is far superior. After the Revereware, I received a gift of Bialetti ceramic non-stick cookware. Didn't like anything about it. Couldn't stack the pieces because the white ceramic would chip; when I washed it, it seemed like there was a residue left--gave it to St. Vinny's. Anyway, I couldn't adapt to the ceramic! I love the Calphalon: it's easy to clean (and can go in the dishwasher), and heats very evenly compared to the Revereware. I might get a small GreenPan, though, to cook eggs.
customer_reviews.author: albertina

customer_reviews.title: Great Stainless set
customer_reviews.text: Not the best out there, but for the price, you can't beat this set.
customer_reviews.author: Nikkisorg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the chemical free cooking! Perfect to replace my old Teflon!
customer_reviews.author: Julianne

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: This cookware is great! I have an old electric stove that I always had trouble cooking on. These pans cook so evenly and I havent had a problem with anything sticking. Just make sure you preheat your pan and add a little olive oil. Definitely recommend these pans!
customer_reviews.author: lisa borghi

customer_reviews.title: Panned
customer_reviews.text: Great set, especially for folks that are just starting out. Yes it's more expensive than some of the other brands but trust me the quality is there. This set has out lived several cheaper counterparts and the majority of them get used daily. If you're still not sold, go to your retail location of choice, pick up a Calphalon pan, and then one of any of the other cheaper brands you were considering instead, be shocked by the difference in quality, then pony up and buy this set.
customer_reviews.author: MLavore

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of stainless steel cookware
customer_reviews.text: Good piece of stainless cooking ware, heavy and really solid. Handle feels good too. for the price of the whole set it's great thou 1 lid cover for the smallest pot is missing as it was described, I'm totally happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: mitzi moye

customer_reviews.title: Top Notch!
customer_reviews.text: I gave the set of cookware to my daughter. She had one Caphlon pan that I gave her a few years ago and loved the quality - always her "go to" pan. She was thrilled to get the set and so was her husband; who by the way is a restaurant manager!
customer_reviews.author: Beachme

customer_reviews.title: Great was a Christmas gift and they loved it
customer_reviews.text: Great was a Christmas gift and they loved it. They arrived a day earlier than was expected, what a great service.
customer_reviews.author: sheila dunn

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS COOKWARE!!!
customer_reviews.text: This cookware meets and exceeds every expectation!!! It looks nice, it cleans up easily and is very practical. I would recommend this cookware to ANYONE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Simpler

customer_reviews.title: Best of the best.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as a gift for our son and his new fiancé. I purchased them because I have had my same set for nearly 8 years and they look as it they are nearly new. I have found the best way to clean the in and outside is by using Mr. Clean Magic Erasers about every other time I use them...I have also used the Barkeeper's Friend for the tougher marks. There is no warping of any of the pans--they remain flat as a pancake to this day. I like the heavy bottom bases which set very evenly on our glass top stove and conduct even heat. I would (and did!) purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: great itm

customer_reviews.title: Great for health reasons
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this stainless set after we had heard the health concerns of using Teflon. We had a couple of pots where the teflon was chipping off. The stainless is excellent for even cooking in the whole pan which was not the case with other brands. The only drawback is that these pots and pans need to be hand washed and dried to keep off water spots and discoloration on the surface . I wonder about the term stainless. We have also noted that when frying, things tend to stick even though we sprayed the pan with the olive oil suggested.
customer_reviews.author: deadpoacher

customer_reviews.title: Try stainless
customer_reviews.text: Love these pans! They are my first stainless set and I won't go back to non stick I had so much trouble with non stick flaking off!
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Fehr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: i am very pleased with this cookware. it's a delight to use.
customer_reviews.author: B&J

customer_reviews.title: These are a really great quality and cook evenly
customer_reviews.text: These are a really great quality and cook evenly. Easy to clean by just warming up water with a little soap in the pan.
customer_reviews.author: S. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: I was tires of non-stick pots and pans
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy that I bought this set of cookware. This set has all the sizes I need for cooking. Food heats fast and I don't have to worry about vapors being released or contaminents in the food. The little bit of margarine or oil spray I need to use does not add that much in calories and is offset by the benefits. The only drawback is having to clean them each time I use them with Barkeeper's Friend but that's only because I want them to keep their "just like new" look a long time.
customer_reviews.author: R. Franz

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I like these pans very much. I do not use them everyday since they have to be hand washed and polished to keep them like new. They cook very evenly and I love the see through lids.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Crecelius

customer_reviews.title: Foos gets stuck to these pans very easy. Buy for me the deal breaker was that ...
customer_reviews.text: I have to agree with the other reviews. They are very hard to clean. Foos gets stuck to these pans very easy. Buy for me the deal breaker was that they are heavy. I found another set for 1/3 of the price and a lot better.
customer_reviews.author: Julieta

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Don't like them at all. Very, very sticky. Can't even fry bacon.
customer_reviews.author: Corina Martt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these pans very easy to clean well made also :)
customer_reviews.author: Karen L. Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Simply Calphalon Stainless has changed.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my first set of Simply Calphalon Stainless in 1980 and I am just now replacing them. They were great stainless cookware. I was so excited to see they had changed the handles so they no longer heat up. I was expecting the same great pots & pans that I've used for over 30 years. Unfortunately, they are not the same. They stain much easier and it takes more scrubbing to keep them clean and polished. It's not the same satin stainless finish. They are "ok" but definitely do not live up to the Calphalon quality and reputation.
customer_reviews.author: SeaQ

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier with this cookware set. They heat evenly and cook beautifully. They are a nice weight - heavy enough to feel solid, but not like lifting weights.
customer_reviews.author: Izzie's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set because of the reviews on Amazon. Although they are some nice looking pots/pans, they're not meant for me. I spent more time cleaning these pans than I did cooking in them. Everything sticks to them, everything burns in them. I tried cooking at lower temperatures and still couldn't figure out how to cook with these without the heavy cleanup afterwards. I'm going to stick to the cheap, non-stick skillets they sell at Big Lots as those seem to do a better job than these pans.
customer_reviews.author: T. Serrano

customer_reviews.title: very, very disappointed with quality after cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Very, disappointed. It is impossible to clean this set by following the Calphalon guidelines. "....NEVER use abrasive pads or cleaners that can damage the pan and void the warranty." I adhered to the Calphalon guidelines and now I have the most disgusting looking pots and pans as I cannot remove the discoloration and stains. I just cannot look at the set anymore, and I have completely complied with Calphalon pre-heating instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Athena

customer_reviews.title: The two frypans will have to be replaced with something else.
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of these, and the thick bottom on the pans--I've just gotten rid of a set that wobbles on my cooktop due to warping. But everything sticks in the frypans, no matter how much oil or butter I use. If I'd bought this set at a store, I'd be taking it back. But I'll probably just take the frypans to the Goodwill and keep the rest.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love! I was frustrated at first with my new pans. However, it was not an issue with these pans, at all. It was the fact that I have been using crappy pans for so long. We have a glass top stove and these pans heat up fast and hold the heat. They washed up beautifully. I wish I had bought these a long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: NC Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: The set came missing the 6 qt sauce pan top. Good luck getting anyone to answer the warranty phone number.
customer_reviews.author: Willy

customer_reviews.title: Great Set
customer_reviews.text: I love these pans. Nice even heat and super easy to clean. I see others had problems with the frying pans but I've used mine without issue. I would only fry an egg in a teflon coated pan so I didn't even try that. I've fried potatoes and I've done grilled cheese without incident. Couldn't be happier with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: sanf

customer_reviews.title: One Hell of a Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This set is excellent quality. They feel solid, durable and look great. I like the glass lids and insulated handles. The cook beautifully on our glass top range. I use olive oil, heat them on a lower temperature and the results are spectacular. I did later purchase their hard anodized 12" skillet too. This is a solid purchase and I highly recommend this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great set, consider your food prep before going stainless
customer_reviews.text: Love these! great choice for a stainless set. However, i still find myself cooking with non stick or cast iron really often for things like eggs and meat. Make sure to consider what you cook before you choose a set.
customer_reviews.author: karilynn

customer_reviews.title: We love these!
customer_reviews.text: Best set of cookware we’ve ever owned. Good looking easy to clean. We would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: John W.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this set of pans. Real glass lids and thick bottoms for even cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Terri O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: One star because this set only looks nice!! The food stays stuck and it is ...
customer_reviews.text: One star because this set only looks nice!! The food stays stuck and it is hard to clean. I don't know who is rating this product with 5 stars. Do you guys only boil water in it?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set!
customer_reviews.text: We had been waiting for so long to purchase a cookware set because we wanted the one that is the best, and we found it! We are now enjoying the glory of the set in our little kitchen kingdom. At first, we made stain on the pan because we put the stove heat on high and this piece seems working great on a lower heat but the pan gets really hot...thanks for the energy saving. I would recommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Imelda

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cookware set
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife. She loves them! They are of good quality and appear durable enough to last for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Gerard

customer_reviews.title: but overall good product. Silicon handle helps a lot with handling ...
customer_reviews.text: Solid pans for the price. Could be a bit thicker, but overall good product. Silicon handle helps a lot with handling hot pans.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas P

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: I like it but there was one size larger sauce pan that I would have liked. They are beautiful and today I saw some on a display at a store and to get all that was in this set would have cost me $65.00 more. I would tell anyone that they are great pans, heavy and also love the handles with the rubber on them.
customer_reviews.author: celia pace

customer_reviews.title: Horrible. The handles on the largest pot have no ...
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. The handles on the largest pot have no insulation and I end up burning my fingers. I stopped using it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Eyassu

customer_reviews.title: Works on Induction cooktop
customer_reviews.text: Needed stainless cookware for our induction cooktop, and this does the job. Admittedly, I'm no professional chef, so I can't speak to that, but it seems to work well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: ... had these pans for a few weeks and I love them so far
customer_reviews.text: I have had these pans for a few weeks and I love them so far. I hope to still love them for many years.
customer_reviews.author: KDKLuray

customer_reviews.title: Calphalon
customer_reviews.text: Son and daughter in law loved them! Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Denise A. Niederriter

customer_reviews.title: Getting more than you pay for:)
customer_reviews.text: Heavy professional grade cookware is what this is. It feels great to get more for less with my hard earned dollars! Highly recommend this product line. Thanks for the deal! -Wygants of Colorado
customer_reviews.author: Kjellyman

customer_reviews.title: Great Set. You won't regret buying these
customer_reviews.text: Great set of pans I use them everyday. very good quality and worth the money. I will be buying these again
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Mainly happy
customer_reviews.text: The appearance and craftsmanship of this cookware set is superb. This double-clad stainless set heats more quickly and more evenly than the non-stick version. The only thing I would change is the small 1 qt/ saucepan. It is much too small. I would be happier if the set included 1.5 and 2 qt. size saucepans.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: quality at a great prce
customer_reviews.text: Great product for how little the price! It's amazing how much better this cooks than my other pots & pans
customer_reviews.author: James M McEnaney

customer_reviews.title: Best pots I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Great pots! Love the rubber handles, they heat water fast, and they're just beautiful! They seem to stain easily, but other than that they are wonderful
customer_reviews.author: rob

customer_reviews.title: The pots are okay but I can't figure out how ...
customer_reviews.text: The pots are okay but I can't figure out how to fry eggs on the fry pan without it sticking and burning! I've tried everything, I went back to my non-stick pans.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Kim

customer_reviews.title: my wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: Dear Readers, My wife loves the Simply Calphalon Stainless Steel 10 piece set. She loves the way it looks and cooks. We are careful, as per instructions, to allow the cookware to cool before placing in our sink where they are easily cleaned.
customer_reviews.author: Harry D. Rothstein

customer_reviews.title: Calphalon Stainless Set
customer_reviews.text: Great build quality. Very durable and look great. My only gripe is that a thin layer of soap scum is left behind when washed in the dishwasher even with Cascade. Nothing that a quick hand rinse doesn't fix. Apart from that it's a great product and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love this set of cookware! I am Completely satisfied. Everything arrived on time and in great condition. And cooking is a breeze in these pans.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Cookware Set
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by Consumer Report. We like the weight and the handles. Disappointed that they stained and discolored after the 1st use.
customer_reviews.author: carlton hodnett

product_meta.title: Simply Calphalon Stainless Steel 10 piece Cookware Set, Silver
product_meta.description: Featuring stainless steel interior and exterior surfaces and an impact-bonded aluminum base for even heating, Simply Calphalon Staineless Steel beautifully combines durability with value. Stainless steel is ideal for all types of cooking including searing and browning, and is dishwasher safe for faster, easier cleanup.
feature_bullets: Set includes essential pans for everyday cooking: 8-in. and 10-in. fry pans; 1-qt. and 2-qt. sauce pans with covers, a 3-qt. sauté pan with cover, and a 6-qt. stock pot with cover
Stainless steel interior and exterior surfaces for lasting durability in the kitchen
Impact-bonded aluminum disc base for even heating and consistent, delicious cooking results
Comfortable silicone-grip handles stay cool when cooking on the stovetop; domed tempered glass covers let you view food while you cook

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars112 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
